metadata.dc:description: Report on one case of lithiasis in a transplanted kidney treated successfully with extracorporeal shockwave lithotrity. This is considered to be the choice therapeutical method when there are no bone interposition or urinary tract obstruction which may preclude the correct removal of lithiasis fragments.
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento mediante ESWL de la litiasis en el riñón trasplantado.
[Treatment with ESWL of lithiasis in the transplanted kidney].
